Title: Storm Rider

reviewText: I just saw this movie and it only proves, once again, that the producers / directors of these "horse" movies need a reliable consultant. At the very beginning, it showed someone wrapping a horse's leg. BACKWARDS !!!! Then it had a lovely scene at a horse show (Arabian  Regionals in Santa Barbara) that was passed off as a Thoroughbred show. Then, as the young girl was walking down a barn aisle, not only was she carrying an Arabian National garland, but it wasn't even the garland that had been presented in the horse show "clip". I know that most viewers wouldn't pick up on these irregularities, but having owned and shown Arabian horses, (at Santa Barbara and the Arabian Nationals) and been on the show circuit for 30 years, this is an insult to my intelligence. Just sayin'
Title: Storm Rider

Title: Storm Rider

reviewText: This one was utterly predictable start to finish, with a cloy plot that drags and styrofoam acting.  Still, as far as family films go it was fine, and plenty of scenes with a lovable mule and various show horses make this ideal for young kids into that kind of thing.  There's a little bit of romance - very predictable and contrived of course - but no real bad content.  In fact, I don't think there was one swear word, no major violence (there's a plane crash later in the film but with only minor injuries - you know, the little bit of blood by the side of the mouth kind of thing) and no adult content, so this is an ideal pizza-night family film if you're into that kind of thing.  If you're a film theory major, hit the Kurosawa section instead and skip this one.
summary: Corny and predictable yet a fun family movie
Title: Storm Rider

reviewText: I love this movie-it is a real feel good film that the whole family can watch together! The main character,Dani,is a spoiled 18 year old whose world is turned upside down when her father is sent to prison and she must go to live with her bachelor uncle,Sam(Kevin Sorbo). Through an orphaned colt Sam gives her to train,Dani learns that caring for others is the key to solving life's problems. Beautiful scenery and a wonderful cast which includes Dani Chuchran and Kristy Swanson as Jody,Sam's love interest,makes this film one you will want to watch over and over-I wholeheartedly recommend it!
summary: A feel good movie the whole family can enjoy!
Title: Storm Rider

reviewText: This well done, superbly acted movie is one you'll want to watch as a family. It is touching from the git go and never sappy like some family films can be. I like the positive attitudes of the two young people. Despite very trying circumstances they both remained sweet natured, caring about others and polite. Kevin Sorbo is a really good actor. The lady who played his girlfriend was also a winner. The younger child's Mon did a great job of playing a nasty women. I highly recommend this movie.
Title: Storm Rider

reviewText: Another great movie that loves movies about horses and a teenage girl and their relationship....What a fantastic movie.. Thanks you....
